badulledi pennanna ape departhamenthuwenuth chithrapatayak lasthi karala thibuna eeka haduwe rajaye chithrapata anshayen...ee kale chithrapata anshe sanskarakayek hatiyata wadakarapu prasiddha naluwek premadasa mahaththaya gana chithrapataya haduwa...me naluwa ee dawaswala mageth ekka hungak hithawath wuna passe kaleka ohu gana rasa katha sagarayak ape ben films eke wada karapu kollo math ekka kiwwa eewa liyanawada nadda kiyala man kalpana karamin inne...mokada ee katha okkoma wage wadihitiyanta pamanayi katha...ee wunata me blogata wadihitiyoth enawa daruwoth enawa ithin api swayan waranayak athi karaganna oonane...
